"""FileID: f07eaf6b-ba2b-451a-8514-27419b5d5dc8"""
class ModuleManager:
    """ID: 7f1f2af2-74a4-46da-8770-e971b3ede500"""
    def __init__(self):
        """ID: e085da26-4e5b-470b-a739-2fe2e6c6d92a"""
        self.internal = {}
        self.external = {}
        self.local = set()
    def create(self, name, fname, external=False):
        """ID: 2e814249-752b-4c8e-8504-21f6465cf614"""
        mod = Module(name, fname)
        if external:
            self.external[name] = mod
        else:
            self.internal[name] = mod
        return mod

    def get(self, name):
        """ID: 0faf5f90-654c-482f-b311-2eb5821de762"""
        if name in self.internal:
            return self.internal[name]
        if name in self.external:
            return self.external[name]

    def get_func_name(self,moduleNs,funcName):
        """ID: a54f8577-d05f-4ee4-b643-66c0d8a2bb52"""
        funcDict:Module = self.get(moduleNs)
        if funcName in funcDict.methods:
            return funcDict.methods[funcName]
    def get_internal_modules(self):
        """ID: f39aae77-629d-4969-80cd-a68389f45065"""
        return self.internal

    def get_external_modules(self):
        """ID: 3adc9c81-4e4c-488a-a57c-4a129423b81c"""
        return self.external

    def add_local_modules(self,moduleNs):
        """ID: 424d3781-9099-4bd5-b2e8-d70d83709fdd"""
        self.local.add(moduleNs)

    def get_local_modules(self):
        """ID: 7624d7e2-85ce-441b-908a-5b6353f18c1b"""
        return self.local
class Module:
    """ID: 7487e125-ac21-45f0-8a0f-4f23aae1b4a9"""
    def __init__(self, name, filename):
        """ID: a852b606-b80d-4fce-8819-87606d49068d"""
        self.name = name
        self.filename = filename
        self.methods = dict()

    def get_name(self):
        """ID: e99e782d-bd4e-4ee4-90aa-f6aa438579bf"""
        return self.name

    def get_filename(self):
        """ID: b6e42136-5f2d-48a7-9786-145642a08843"""
        return self.filename

    def get_methods(self):
        """ID: c561746b-2b25-4bf2-9a48-0fe560706138"""
        return self.methods

    def add_method(self, method, first=None, last=None):
        """ID: 1ba8b3d4-86ea-4f2b-990e-1c0b30318fec"""
        if not self.methods.get(method, None):
            self.methods[method] = dict(
                    name=method,
                    first=first,
                    last=last)
